Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans

Class StrongboxBean

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans.StrongboxBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, PlayerBean
public class StrongboxBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, PlayerBean
Class used to serialize a UnlimitedStorage object (in particular a Strongbox), send it over the network and store its information in the client

      public java.lang.String printLine​(int line)
